<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-predicateinfo-cpp-/#a9db24ad92c2d78d94c6535a8d7f57d7f"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;BasicBlock &#42;, BasicBlock &#42;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-predicateinfo-cpp-/#a9db24ad92c2d78d94c6535a8d7f57d7f">getBlockEdge</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/predicatebase">PredicateBase</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#afd1501c49c84f3addfd108c2484f5674">PB</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PredicateWithEdge&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#afd1501c49c84f3addfd108c2484f5674">PB</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="normal">         </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Not a predicate info type we know how to get an edge from.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SameBlock = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a2e38c85003a042421cde1647632d0b72">A</a>.DFSIn == <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.DFSIn;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We want to put the def that will get used for a given set of phi uses,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// So we sort by edge, then by def.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Note that only phi nodes uses and defs can come last.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See if we have real values or uses. If we have real values, we are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// guaranteed they are instructions or arguments. No matter what, we are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// guaranteed they are in the same block if they are instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal">      ValueDFS VD;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Put the phi node uses in the incoming block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;IBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PN = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PHINode&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">        IBlock = PN-&gt;getIncomingBlock(U);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Make phi node users appear last in the incoming block</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// they are from.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">        VD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a5607c7a08912063c13fa6893a6404525">LocalNum</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a308aa71e66e6522ef65504c0250cf5d2">LN&#95;Last</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If it&#39;s not a phi node use, it is somewhere in the middle of the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">        IBlock = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock/#a1b4bf7c97cdc8159fd73d48063f0b250">getParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58b9df85470fc4e2a8066ff6a62e5a34">DomTreeNode</a> &#42;DomNode = DT.getNode(IBlock);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It&#39;s possible our use is in an unreachable block. Skip it if so.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/isd/#a22ea9cec080dd5f4f47ba234c2f59110a8472e46f9e4db168c5610ecdfb05dbaf">BasicBlock</a> &#42;SecondBB = BI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchinst/#aa05da2b94b366573d1651d5b163c521e">getSuccessor</a>(1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BasicBlock &#42;Succ : &#123;FirstBB, SecondBB&#125;) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> TakenEdge = Succ == FirstBB;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t try to insert on a self-edge. This is mainly because we will</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00431" /><CodeLine lineNumber="431"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// eliminate during renaming anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00432" /><CodeLine lineNumber="432"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Succ == BranchBB)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Given the renaming stack, make all the operands currently on the stack real</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// by inserting them into the IR.  Return the last operation&#39;s value.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;PredicateInfoBuilder::materializeStack(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;Counter,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             ValueDFSStack &amp;RenameStack,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &#42;OrigOp) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find the first thing we have to materialize</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RevIter = RenameStack.rbegin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (; RevIter != RenameStack.rend(); ++RevIter)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RevIter-&gt;Def)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Start = RevIter - RenameStack.rbegin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The maximum number of things we should be trying to materialize at once</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// right now is 4, depending on if we had an assume, a branch, and both used</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and of conditions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RenameIter = RenameStack.end() - Start;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"><Highlight kind="normal">       RenameIter != RenameStack.end(); ++RenameIter) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><Highlight kind="normal">        RenameIter == RenameStack.begin() ? OrigOp : (RenameIter - 1)-&gt;Def;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs">ValueDFS</a> &amp;Result = &#42;RenameIter;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;ValInfo = Result.PInfo;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><Highlight kind="normal">    ValInfo-&gt;RenamedOp = (RenameStack.end() - Start) == RenameStack.begin()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><Highlight kind="normal">                             ? OrigOp</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><Highlight kind="normal">                             : (RenameStack.end() - Start - 1)-&gt;Def;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For edge predicates, we can just place the operand in the block before</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the terminator.  For assume, we have to place it right before the assume</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to ensure we dominate all of our uses.  Always insert right before the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// relevant instruction (terminator, assume), so that we insert in proper</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// order in the case of multiple predicateinfo in the same block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The number of named values is used to detect if a new declaration was</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// added. If so, that declaration is tracked so that it can be removed when</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the analysis is done. The corner case were a new declaration results in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a name clash and the old name being renamed is not considered as that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// represents an invalid module.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PredicateWithEdge&gt;</a>(ValInfo)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(getBranchTerminator(ValInfo));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDecls = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function">Function</a> &#42;IF = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent(), Intrinsic::ssa&#95;copy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumDecls != <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">        PI.CreatedDeclarations.insert(IF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/callinst">CallInst</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a> =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateCall(IF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getName() + </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;.&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> + <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/twine">Twine</a>(Counter++));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">      PI.PredicateMap.insert(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>, ValInfo&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">      Result.Def = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PAssume = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PredicateAssume&gt;</a>(ValInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(PAssume &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Should not have gotten here without it being an assume&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the predicate directly after the assume. While it also holds</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// directly before it, assume(i1 true) is not a useful fact.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aa241826e10b4a9bf77c3115e7160d3c7">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>(PAssume-&gt;AssumeInst-&gt;getNextNode());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumDecls = F.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/codeview/#adfebd8c4ae29ccd84c600c1e65d6b807a86408593c34af77fdd90df932f8b5261">Function</a> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpuisd/#a739d53294bc38cd6b0b23332f9994c0eac5f4a93ee302ab324b2d6be4da7d1995">IF</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/intrinsic/#a0cff8be0190d8e20b7cf13646f34afa2">Intrinsic::getOrInsertDeclaration</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">          F.getParent(), Intrinsic::ssa&#95;copy, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>-&gt;getType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NumDecls != F.getParent()-&gt;getNumNamedValues())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">        PI.CreatedDeclarations.insert(IF);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="normal">      CallInst &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.CreateCall(IF, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="normal">      PI.PredicateMap.insert(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>, ValInfo&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/ms-demangle/#afb795990ffc0cb7321e7d1eacc246324a8eea62084ca7e541d918e823422bd82e">Result</a>.Def = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#ad4d247df65c12507f447383be37d7ccb">PIC</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RenameStack.back().Def;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Instead of the standard SSA renaming algorithm, which is O(Number of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instructions), and walks the entire dominator tree, we walk only the defs +</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// uses.  The standard SSA renaming algorithm does not really rely on the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dominator tree except to order the stack push/pops of the renaming stacks, so</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// that defs end up getting pushed before hitting the correct uses.  This does</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// not require the dominator tree, only the &#42;order&#42; of the dominator tree. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// complete and correct ordering of the defs and uses, in dominator tree is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// contained in the DFS numbering of the dominator tree. So we sort the defs and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// uses into the DFS ordering, and then just use the renaming stack as per</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// normal, pushing when we hit a def (which is a predicateinfo instruction),</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// popping when we are out of the dfs scope for that def, and replacing any uses</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// with top of stack if it exists.  In order to handle liveness without</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// propagating liveness info, we don&#39;t actually insert the predicateinfo</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// instruction def until we see a use that it would dominate.  Once we see such</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a use, we materialize the predicateinfo instruction in the right place and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// use it.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: Use this algorithm to perform fast single-variable renaming in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// promotememtoreg and memoryssa.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PredicateInfoBuilder::renameUses(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectorimpl">SmallVectorImpl&lt;Value &#42;&gt;</a> &amp;OpsToRename) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">  ValueDFS&#95;Compare <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mcid/#ab357441fcd1ea1f9b0d27c12700f6023a1328ed43be8173506f59f88c9bfd8b8c">Compare</a>(DT);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute liveness, and rename in O(uses) per Op.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> : OpsToRename) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Visiting &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Counter = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a8fc529c79977cdd01e187986f960a07f">SmallVector&lt;ValueDFS, 16&gt;</a> OrderedUses;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;ValueInfo = getValueInfo(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the possible copies into the def/use list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// They will become real copies if we find a real use for them, and never</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// created otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;PossibleCopy : ValueInfo.Infos) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">      ValueDFS VD;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Determine where we are going to place the copy by the copy type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The predicate info for branches always come first, they will get</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// materialized in the split block at the top of the block.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The predicate info for assumes will be somewhere in the middle,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// it will get materialized in front of the assume.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;PAssume = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a22eeee01734061ac1b31ccd994c49eef">dyn&#95;cast&lt;PredicateAssume&gt;</a>(PossibleCopy)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal">        VD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a5607c7a08912063c13fa6893a6404525">LocalNum</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a897d843742d5f7e0eba427a397c52775a68fdabff8b3118c0e68625dce3b18c8c">LN&#95;Middle</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a58b9df85470fc4e2a8066ff6a62e5a34">DomTreeNode</a> &#42;DomNode = DT.getNode(PAssume-&gt;AssumeInst-&gt;getParent());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!DomNode)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">        VD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#abcf869d6b4e1360809b2b7ce8d319cdc">DFSIn</a> = DomNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#a718717ee958956ec34ed177ef0b7f2ba">getDFSNumIn</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">        VD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a19d8714858d8500a598848f43b46f925">DFSOut</a> = DomNode-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/domtreenodebase/#ad7f56029a023764c65cef48f0398c9ba">getDFSNumOut</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">        VD.<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/valuedfs/#a4d7a18adbe6f80dc385304f220e9fdb1">PInfo</a> = PossibleCopy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">        OrderedUses.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(VD);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a92ca992e52dddc420f4b069cae06dfbe">isa&lt;PredicateWithEdge&gt;</a>(PossibleCopy)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If we can only do phi uses, we treat it like it&#39;s in the branch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// block, and handle it specially. We know that it goes last, and only</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// dominate phi uses.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BlockEdge = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-predicateinfo-cpp-/#a9db24ad92c2d78d94c6535a8d7f57d7f">getBlockEdge</a>(PossibleCopy);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (EdgeUsesOnly.count(BlockEdge)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Here we require a stable sort because we do not bother to try to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
